titleStmt.title: Ornatus muliebris Anglicanus or The severall habits of English women, from the nobilitie: to the contry woman, as they are in these times Wenceslaus Hollar, Bohemus fecit Londini Æ. 1640.
titleStmt.author: Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by H. Overton at the White Horse without Newgate...,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name transposed from before statement of responsibility.
Some plates are undated, others dated 1638-1640.
Several post-1640 states of these plates exist, each with a printseller named on the title page.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 715 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1948 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
